bastiyansakasuma – wijaya chithragaraya, rajya chithrapatasanstha chithragarayagitha patigatha saha shabda paripalanaya - jorj manathungasangitha adhyakshanaya – klarans wijewardhanagitha – okanda wela sitha okanda wela - anjalin gunathilaka (klarans wijewardhana)sanda thaniwela ahase - miltan mallawaaarachchi, anjalin ( klarans wijewardhana)kalak awamen perum pura - miltan, anjalin (dharmasiri gamage)sana keliye sanda eliye - klarans wijewardhana (dharmasiri gamage)ra sithalayi aasha galayi – anjalin gunathilaka (jorj lesli ranasinha)sonduru lowata mal wahala - ech.
